name: Halfmoon
description: A customizable documentation and blog theme based on the Halfmoon framework with a built-in dark and light mode
author: Marc Anton Dahmen

tooltips.+main: The main content of the page
tooltips.actionButtonClass:
The Halfmoon class for the action button:
btn-primary
btn-secondary
btn-danger
btn-success
btn-link
tooltips.brand: In case there is no logo defined, this field can be used for any kind of markup like HTML or SVG to serve as the brand of the site
tooltips.cardImageRelativeHeight: The relative height of a card image in percent — the default is 75%
tooltips.checkboxHideTableOfContents: Hide the table of contents sidebar
tooltips.checkboxHideThumbnails: Hide thumbnails within a masonry page grid
tooltips.checkboxHideTitle: Hide the page title and tags
tooltips.checkboxNavbarMenuRight: Move the navigation menu to the right
tooltips.checkboxShowAllPagesInPagelist: Show not only children but all pages in the pagelist
tooltips.checkboxShowInFooter: Show a link to this page in the footer
tooltips.checkboxShowInNavbar: Show a link to this page in the navbar
tooltips.customProperties: Custom CSS properties to customize the main styles of the Halfmoon framework — check out available properties here
tooltips.filterPagelistByUrl: Filters the pagelist by URLs matching a given regular expression like for example '(/portfolio|/blog)'
tooltips.formatDate: The format for displaying the date of a page — you can find more information about date formats here
tooltips.imageAppleTouchIcon: The file to be used as Apple touch icon
tooltips.imageFavicon: The file to be used as favicon
tooltips.imageOpenGraph: A glob pattern to select a preview image for Twitter, Facebook or similar social network cards. This could be for example `*.png, *.jpg`
tooltips.imageTeaser: A glob pattern or a filename to define the teaser image for a page
tooltips.itemsFooter: Additional markup to be included right before the closing body tag
tooltips.itemsHeader: Additional markup to be included right before the closing head tag
tooltips.itemsPerPage: Limit the items of the pagelist per page
tooltips.labelShowAll: The text for show all button
tooltips.locale: The locale information to format date and time according to like 'en_EN' or 'de_DE'
tooltips.metaDescription: An optional meta description to be used for Twitter, Facebook or similar social network cards
tooltips.metaTitle: An optional meta title to be used for the browser title bar and links used on Twitter, Facebook or similar social networks
tooltips.notificationNoSearchResults: Notification text for an empty list of search results
tooltips.placeholderSearch: Placeholder text for the search field of the main menu
tooltips.sortPagelist: Sorting of the pages in a blog pagelist. Note that the sorting and filtering buttons should be hidden in case this variable is defined! The default is 'date desc'. You can choose any other page variable in combination with an order (asc or desc) like ':path asc'
tooltips.tableOfContentsTitle: The title of the table of contents sidebar
tooltips.urlActionButtonTargetPage: The URL for an optional action button in the navbar
tooltips.urlContextForPagelist: Defines an alternative URL to be used as the pagelist's parent page, instead of the current one
tooltips.urlSearchResults: The URL of the search results page — defaults to the homepage
